General.Name: Yelooo Integra Datanet Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Yelooo Integra Datanet Tbk engages in leasing communication technology equipment in Indonesia. It provides tour and travel services, as well as trades in communication equipment. The company also sells mobile phone, prepaid voucher, electronic phone credit, and internet data packages. In addition, it engages in the trading activities; and provides information and communication, industry processing, professional, scientific, and technical services. The company was founded in 2016 and is headquartered in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia. PT Yelooo Integra Datanet Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Artalindo Semesta Nusantara.
General.Address: Jalan Alaydrus No.66 BC RT.010, Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia, 10130
